data.message: You have no right to call yourself an American. You kneel for the national anthem, believe that Capercunt is oppressed when he earns millions per year and call real fucking war heroes racist Nazis.You're a traitor to your country. You also claim to hate a man who you personally praised more than once, but as soon as he becomes the President instead of some epileptic psychopath who can't stop falling down and coughing, you throw a fucking fit. Fuck you loser. You're losing your followers and you're rapidly becoming irrelevant.
